title: Senior AR Applications Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work....Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space.
description: Apple makes the newest technologies accessible to create amazing user experiences...You will work closely with artists, designers and engineers to define and prove new application concepts and UX paradigms, and solve incredibly challenging and interesting problems in Spatial Computing.
preferred_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in software development....Good intuition in making time vs. complexity tradeoffs.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range....Learn more about Apple Benefits....Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
